room_title: Escape room "The Egyptian Tomb" by Greeley's Great Escape in Fort Collins
review: We had so much fun! It was definitely challenging and had a nice mix of puzzles. Definitely worth trying one of their rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Egyptian Tomb" by Greeley's Great Escape in Fort Collins
review: We loved this place. We just finished. It's the first one that we failed, but we were one member short of out 4 person team. So we're not taking it too hard. Great experience and a lot of fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Egyptian Tomb" by Greeley's Great Escape in Fort Collins
review: This was our 16th escape room! We loved it even though we didn't escape. There was something for everyone when it came to the puzzles. Some very unique elements too! You should try this one for sure!
